name: Deep Dive into the Dark Depths
name_original: Deep Dive into the Dark Depths
description:
Dive into an adventure deeper and deeper into the dark and unknown in Deep Dive into the Dark Depths!

This game features a mixture of gameplay elements that feel somewhere in between Frogger and a bullet hell. What lies at the bottom of this deep, dark trench?

CONTROLS

WASD or Arrow keys, your pick. Should in theory also support an xbox controller, but it remains untested.

FISH VARIETIES

* Feesh - Rather stupid. Yellow in tint, move in one direction.

* Foosh - The more aggressive Feesh. Blue in color. It follows divers, and hates when they get away.

* Sploosh - Green fish, able to shoot algae projectiles. Likes their personal space, though. Use that to your advantage.

* Gloosh - Glowing green fish. They are passive and don't want to make you drown, they just want to light the way.

* Snark - Big meanies. Come in at high velocity, but your scuba gear is able to detect them shortly before they plow on through.

* Skadoosh - ?????????

* Kaboosh - ate too much taco bell
